modName: Craftable Jagged Crown and Bloody Jagged Crown
summary: Craftable Jagged Crowns, one slightly bloodier ;)
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][b]IMPORTANT:[/b] If you\'ve previously installed the mod be sure to disable and uninstall completely before installing the new version! You will have to re-craft your helm unfortunately. Sorry for the inconvenience.[/color]

This adds craftable versions of the Jagged Crown to your game, one default and one bloody. They can be found under the Dragon smithing section and it can be upgraded at the workbench and can be enchanted. It should work with all vanilla races, both male and female models included.

[u][b]Dragonplate Crown (Heavy Armor):[/b][/u]
2 Dragon Bone
1 Dragon Scale
2 Leather strips
2 Bloody Rags (for the bloody version)

[u][b]Dragonscale Crown (Light Armor):[/b][/u]
2 Dragon Bone
2 Dragon Scale
1 Leather Strip
2 Bloody Rags (for the bloody version)

[b][u]Changelog:[/u][/b]
v3: New file structures and added a default version of the Jagged Crown. The helms have been renamed to Dragonplate Crown and Dragonscale Crown for consistency. Additional load screen featuring the Bloody crown included (hopefully!)
v2: Added a light armor version.
v1: Craftable bloody Jagged Crown.

All credit goes to Bethesda for the original Jagged Crown model, and to user [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1637252]xvom[/url] for the awesome original texture (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3263).

This is my first mod, so please let me know if there are any bugs/errors. Feedback is appreciated!
author: kalthrok
